solution_line_template: Before going to bed, Rachel did a total of {problems_per_minute} × {minutes_before_bed} = <<{problems_per_minute}*{minutes_before_bed}={problems_before_bed}>>{problems_before_bed} problems.
In total Rachel did {problems_before_bed} + {problems_at_lunch} = <<{problems_before_bed}+{problems_at_lunch}={total_problems}>>{total_problems} maths problems.
